message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $13,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but $13,000 is my lowest possible price. This product is truly unique and worth the investment.
I understand that the product is unique, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,000. Can you consider this compromise?
